name: Two Nights At Lake Frontier
description:
So your dad has taken you up to Lake Frontier, a tiny lake in the middle of a national park to camp and fish just like the good old days. Sounds good, except for the slew of recent animal attacks. And sightings of a large wild animal in the woods.

Go fishing at Lake Frontier, show people what you find, fix your relationship with your dad, and...

Date Mothman?
